about.title: About Us
about.description: Jamia Dar-E-Arqam Karoshi is a distinguished residential Islamic educational institution for boys, dedicated to providing comprehensive Islamic education combined with contemporary academic curriculum. We strive to develop students not just as seekers of knowledge, but as God-fearing, morally upright, and responsible individuals who act according to the spirit of Islam in every field of life.
